non_compliant.section: Customised, Targeting Content, Advertising and Newsletters - to provide customised content, make recommendations based on your past activities regarding our Services and advertising (directly or via our partners such as social media networks), as well as to provide you with newsletters and other communications by post, telephone, emails and/or other electronic communication means; to process any subscriptions you have signed up for, including eDMs or newsletters.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing; Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend: This section lacks specificity regarding the legal basis for processing user data for targeted content and advertising.  It should explicitly state the legal basis for each processing purpose (e.g., consent, legitimate interest) and, where applicable, how consent is obtained and managed.  For instance, if relying on consent for personalized ads, the policy should specify how users can opt in or out.  Additionally, it should clarify the legal basis for sharing data with partners, ensuring compliance with GDPR's data sharing and transfer requirements.  For electronic communications, it should mention compliance with ePrivacy Directive (and relevant national laws implementing it), particularly regarding consent for electronic marketing.
